column5: hi all,im new here from ontario.i love fishing and looking forward to making new friends my name is alan,im 47.i used to fish quite a lot,but its been rather tough the last few years. id love to do a fly in.any info on your favorite thunderhook lakes would be appreciated i love walleye,trout,bass...trophy pike.

welcome to the best Canada fishing board that there is - there's no strangers here, just friends we haven't met yet. just curious as to why you mention thunderhook and none of the hundreds of other excellent outfitters? keep posting. phish

I've only fished shab years ago under a different outfitter, having said that if I could pick a lake they have it would be keeshik hands down. I'm a brook trout fan and its no secret that the keeshik river is one of the best albany tribs and probably top ten in Ontario.
I just dis a google search and thunderhook came up as a highly recommended outfitter
for your consideration (you can see additional reports by searching kearns on this board):https://www.walleyecentral.com/forum...ht=kearns+lake phish
